snippet: Mr. Heimerdinger, who coached offensive units for the Denver Broncos, the Jets and the Tennessee Titans, helped mold players like Steve McNair, Vince Young and Jay Cutler.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Heimerdinger, who coached offensive units for the Denver Broncos, the Jets and the Tennessee Titans, helped mold players like Steve McNair, Vince Young and Jay Cutler.

headline.main: Mike Heimerdinger, 58, Who Helped to Coach Super Bowl Winners, Is Dead
headline.print_headline: Mike Heimerdinger, Quarterbacks’ Mentor, Dies at 58
headline.seo: Mike Heimerdinger, Quarterbacks’ Mentor, Dies at 58
